How do I reset my testnet without closing Verus?

You can't reset your testnet without closing Verus. To reset your testnet, you need to make sure Verus is closed (and no testnet daemon is running) and then delete the specified directories. After that, you can restart the testnet daemon (or relaunch Verus Desktop, deactivate verustest, and re-add verustest native).

## Testnet Reset
To reset your testnet make sure Verus is closed (and no testnet daemon running) and delete the following directories, then restart the testnet daemon (or relaunch Verus Desktop, deactivate verustest and re-add verustest native):
